rules.name: foxesSpawnWithBerries
rules.description: A spawned fox has a chance to hold berries

rules.name: gatewaysSpawnChorus
rules.description: Chorus Plants generate with End Gateways in void

rules.name: lightningElectrifiesVines
rules.description: Lightning striking glowstone with attached vines converts them to glow lichen

rules.name: rammingWart
rules.description: A Goat ramming a Nether Wart Block will break it apart

rules.name: renewableBuddingAmethysts
rules.description: Surrounding lava by calcite and smooth basalt forms budding amethysts

rules.name: renewableDiamonds
rules.description: An Anvil falling on a full stack of Coal Blocks compacts it into a Diamond

rules.name: renewableDragonHeads
rules.description: Ender Dragons killed by Charged Creepers drop their heads

rules.name: renewableHeartsOfTheSea
rules.description: Dolphins can find a heart of the sea when given fish

rules.name: shulkerSpawning
rules.description: Shulkers spawn on obsidian pillar when Ender Dragon is re-killed

rules.name: usefulComposters
rules.description: Composters create sand, red sand, and dirt depending on biome

rules.name: wanderingTraderSkyBlockTrades
rules.description: Add trades to the wandering trader for SkyBlock
